about_the_game:
INFO: It seems that the game encounters some bugs on certain VR headsets not listed in the description (end of page) While waiting for the patch currently being developed, you can test your hardware on the free demo.

There's a fine line between dreams and nightmares...

THE GAME:

  • “Very Bad Dreams” is an intense and demanding experience that will put your nerves to the test.

  • Forget everything you thought you knew about horror games, because “Very Bad Dreams” transcends the boundaries of the gaming experience.

  • Developed by a 3-person independent French studio, “Very Bad Dreams” is much more than just a game.

  • It's an extraordinary immersive experience, where your survival depends on real-life actions. You'll have to react instinctively to survive in this frightening world.

  • Feel the impact of your strike force, feel vibrations in your head when you're hit by an enemy or your heart races, run and jump using your real gestures, hold your head with both hands to keep from going mad.

  • All these new gameplay elements will give you the impression of never doing the same thing.

  • Do you like to search for endless loot? Try out hundreds of weapon and potion combinations? Spending hours in your inventory?

  • “Very Bad Dreams" is not for you... Whether you've got a gun, a bat or a knife, the best thing to do is to run away and NOT TO SINK INTO THE MADNESS...

THE STORY:

You wake up on an idyllic beach, your feet in the white sand, lulled by a gentle breeze as the sun sets on the horizon. During this tranquil stroll, the gates of hell open up to you.

Driven by your pride, you think you can pass through them without suffering the consequences, but soon the perfect dream in which you found yourself turns into an oppressive nightmare with no way out.

Fight for your very existence in an atmosphere where madness is palpable and anxiety grows with every step you take, confronting hordes of zombies, solving puzzles or searching for the best place to hide.

For the bravest among you, get ready for an extraordinary immersive experience, where horror comes to life and every moment can seal your fate.

Face your inner demons, triumph over your deepest fears. But remember, never succumb to madness.

Dare you plunge into the endless abyss of “Very Bad Dreams”?

We've warned you!

CONTENTS :

Includes “Dean's Dream” DLC, exploring the twists and turns of Dean's memory.

Includes a Soundtrack mode (yes, just like in the good old 90s games, but with a “Very Bad Dreams” twist).

COMING SOON:

New DLC will be added free of charge in 2025.

VR COMPATIBLE HARDWARE:

“Very Bad Dreams” has been tested with ‘Meta Quest 2’, ‘Meta Quest 3’, ‘Meta Quest 3s’, ‘Oculus Rift’, ‘Oculus Rift S’ VR headsets.

Very Bad Dreams is bhaptic compatible with over 40 different actions!

“BAD DREAMS” OWNERS:

If you own a Steam, PS4 or Meta Quest version of “Bad Dreams”, you can request a free upgrade to “Very Bad Dreams” by writing to contact@crvr3d.com”!

So we're not being kind at CREATIVE VR3D!

Life's a game...

CRVR3D team

content_descriptors.notes:
- The game contains scenes mentioning tobacco and alcohol.
- The game contains gore scenes with lots of blood.
- The game contains scenes with insects that may offend phobics (Spiders, Cockroaches, etc.)

name: VERY BAD DREAMS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: - Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 5600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2, 3 and 3s, Meta RIft, Meta Rift S
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 / Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2080 / AMD Radeon RX 6700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2, 3 and 3s, Meta RIft, Meta Rift S
